attributes.action: support the banning of MP's employing family members within their own parliamentary office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All Parliamentary jobs should be where possible, open to the public through a fair application process. No MP should be able to employ his/her partner or other family member and pay them from public funds. It is an old 'perk' that hinders transparent and fair government. Nepotism has no place in Parliament.
